meanings.definition: Not having undergone an official examination or review.
meanings.sent1: The company's unaudited financial statements were not verified by an expert.
meanings.sent2: The unaudited report was missing important details.
meanings.sent3: It was like turning in an unaudited homework assignment to the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The unaudited data was a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of relying on unaudited information can be risky.

meanings.definition: Not having been subjected to an audit.
meanings.sent1: The unaudited expenses were not checked for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The unaudited accounts needed to be reviewed for errors.
meanings.sent3: He felt like an unaudited document in a sea of audits.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an unaudited library of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The unaudited inventory caused confusion during the stocktake.
